Header.description: AN OPEN RANK, OSU! LAZER TOURNAMENT

Descriptions.mappool: A lazer modpool featuring new mods each week.
Descriptions.format: An open rank, double elimination, 3v3 tournament.
Descriptions.schedule: Watch upcoming matches being streamed on Twitch.

Originals.title: Originais
Originals.subtitle: CUSTOM SONGS COMING SOON.
Originals.description: Advance through the stages to unlock exclusive TEST Originals. Talented creators crafted custom tracks that progressively reveal at qualifiers, semifinals, finals, and grand finals. With each original featuring unique style and art, these beatmaps are reserved for the tournament's top competitors.

Footer.description: AN OPEN RANK, OSU! LAZER TOURNAMENT HOSTED BY TEDDY, ENTROPY, AND SORA.

Metadata.description: Osu!'s first large scale open rank lazer tournament. Welcome to the new osu tournament experience.

Closed.title: REGISTRATIONS CLOSED!
Closed.message: Registros estão atualmente fechados até que o torneio comece. Por favor, volte assim que a contagem regressiva na página inicial terminar.

Success.title: TIME CRIADO!
Success.message: Bem-vindo ao TEST Open! Clique o botão abaixo para ver a página de gerenciamento do seu time e comece a convidar jogadores.

Messages.default: Por favor, faça login antes de acessar esta página.

Messages.default: Please click the button below to gain access to the server.
